 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשֵׁשׁ‎</span>] **verb** ==waste away== (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ašašu***</u></abbr>, ***moth***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***moth*** (-worm), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***eat*** (of moth; ? denominative); according to [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Ps 6:8</sup> and others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשֵׁשׁ‎</span> is denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשׁ‎</span>, properly ***be moth-eaten***, but improbable); **\*\***according to Jacob<sup>ZMG 1901, 141; ZAW 1902, 107</sup> ***be dark***, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשׁשׁא‎</span> ***darkness***, in Christian-Palestinian Aramaic. — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽשְׁשָׁה מִכַּעַם עֵינִי‎</span> [[Ps.6.8|Ps 6:8]] ***my eye is wasted from grief***, = [[Ps.31.10|Ps 31:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכַעַס‎</span>; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשִׁי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּטְנִי‎</span>; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצָמַי עָשֵׁ֫שׁוּ‎</span> v[[Ps.31.11|Ps 31:11]].
